name: LFS Outgauge
short_description:
Second video of LFS driving a VW Passat instrument-cluster. LFS sends data on UDP Port. I wrote a program in C# with Insim.NET [1]. The C#-Program reads the data from UDP Port and sends data to microntroller via USB (virtual serial port [2])
The microcontroller processes the simulationdata and generates the signals for instrument cluster.
Have fun ;-)

[1] http://insimdotnet.codeplex.com/
[2] http://www.pjrc.com/teensy/usb_serial.html
summary: Live for Speed Insim Outgauge / Dashboard
